name: WC Key Manager
author: PluginEver

sections.description:
WC Key Manager is a WooCommerce extension that allows you to manage product keys and licenses easily. It is a perfect solution for businesses that sell software, games, or any other digital products that require a license key.
Enable a product to sell with a license key, and the plugin will automatically send the key to the customer after the purchase.
sections.installation:
Minimum requirements

  • WordPress 5.0 or greater
  • WooCommerce 5.0 or greater
  • PHP version 5.6 or greater
  • MySQL version 5.6 or greater
  • MariaDB version 10 or later

Automatic installation

Automatic installation is the easiest option as WordPress handles the file transfers itself and you don’t need to leave your web browser. To do an automatic installation of WC Key Manager, log in to your WordPress dashboard, navigate to the Plugins menu and click “Add New”.

In the search field type “WC Key Manager” and click Search Plugins. Once you have found the plugin you can view details about it such as plugin version, rating, and description. Most importantly, of course, you can install it by simply clicking “Install Now”.

Manual installation

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/wc-key-manager directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress.

Updating

Automatic updates should work like a charm; as always though, ensure you backup your site just in case.

short_description: Easily sell products keys from your WooCommerce shop.
description:
WC Key Manager is a WooCommerce extension that allows you to manage product keys and licenses easily. It is a perfect solution for businesses that sell software, games, or any other digital products that require a license key.
Enable a product to sell with a license key, and the plugin will automatically send the key to the customer after the purchase.
